name: Benthic Communities and Environmental Parameters in Three Mediterranean Ports (Sardinia, Crete, Tunisia)
description: Three seasonal sampling campaigns (winter, summer before touristic period, summer after touristic period) were implemented during 2012 in three Mediterraneantouristic ports: Cagliari (Sardinia, Italy), Heraklion(Crete, Greece) and El Kantaoui (Tunisia).Three to five stationswere sampled per port, whichwere part of different port sectors (leisure, fishing, passenger, cargo, shipyard). Three waterand three sediment replicate samples were collected per station for analysis of nutrients,pigments and hydrocarbons. One replicate wasanalysed for physical parameters, heavy metals and granulometry. Five sediment replicateswere collected for analysis of benthic biodiversity. Benthic organisms were sorted to themain taxonomic groups (e.g. .Annelida, Mollusca, Arthropoda,Echinodermata) and identified to specieslevel.

Three waterand three sediment replicate samples were collected per station for analysis of nutrients,pigments and hydrocarbons. One replicate wasanalysed for physical parameters, heavy metals and granulometry. Five sediment replicateswere collected for analysis of benthic biodiversity. Benthic organisms were sorted to themain taxonomic groups (e.g. .Annelida, Mollusca, Arthropoda,Echinodermata) and identified to specieslevel.
